start.message: This is command, do you copy?

replies.text: Copy, command. Awaiting orders.
I read you. Situation report?

order1.message: Stand by for further instructions. Maintain radio silence until contact.

replies.text: Understood. Standing by.

report.message: Situation is stable. All units accounted for.

replies.text: Acknowledged.

start_human.message: Command, this is Bravo-3. We've detected an old supply beacon, off-route. Could be pre-Collapse rations, sir.

replies.text: Negative, Bravo-3. Maintain current patrol vector.
Proceed with caution. Report findings immediately.
Acknowledged.
Proceed. Awaiting report.

scav_report_human.message: Command, Bravo-3. Cache found. Mostly moldy, but we salvaged some MREs and a functional power cell. Good find!

replies.text: Excellent work, Bravo-3. Return to patrol.

scav_report_failed.message: Command, Bravo-3. We found the cache, but it was empty. Just a busted transponder. No rations.

replies.text: Understood. Return to patrol.

start_entity.message: Command, this is Bravo-3. We've detected an old supply beacon. Off-route. Could be pre-Collapse rations. *Highly* likely.

replies.text: Negative, Bravo-3. Maintain current patrol vector.
Proceed with caution. Report findings immediately.
Acknowledged.
Proceed. Awaiting report.

scav_report_entity.message: Command, Bravo-3. Cache found. Minimal rations, but... we found something *else*. A... new specimen. *Quiet*.

replies.text: Report full details on this 'specimen.' Do not approach.

scav_specimen_entity.message: It is... inert. For now. We are bringing it back for study. Its form is... *intricate*.

replies.text: Understood. Bring it to research lab 4 for immediate containment.

start_human.message: Anomaly detected. Sector Gamma-7. Energy spike: erratic. Possible local geological instability.

replies.text: Request clarification. What type of anomaly signature?
Dispatch drone for visual confirmation. Prioritize safety.

anomaly_clarify_human.message: Signature matches... minor seismic activity. Unusually high frequency for this region.

replies.text: Log the data. Monitor for recurrence.

anomaly_drone_human.message: Drone feed active. Visual: small localized geothermal vent. Safe.

replies.text: Acknowledged. Resume drone patrol.

start_entity.message: Anomaly detected. Sector Gamma-7. Energy spike: erratic. *Familiar* signature.

replies.text: Request clarification. What type of anomaly signature?
Dispatch drone for visual confirmation. Prioritize safety.

anomaly_clarify_entity.message: Signature... *unreadable*. Attempting further analysis. Data corrupted.

replies.text: Unreadable? Flag sector Gamma-7 as high priority anomaly.

anomaly_drone_entity.message: Visual... obscured. Wait... a form... *moving*... [static burst] Drone lost.

replies.text: Drone lost? Initiate immediate quarantine of Sector Gamma-7! Send retrieval team.

start_human.message: [Heavy static]... anyone? ... children... please... [brief scream]...

replies.text: Attempt signal enhancement. Trace origin.
Mark as unknown. Prioritize clear signals.

distress_enhance_human.message: Command, this is... Maria... trapped... perimeter... please... [cuts out].

replies.text: Origin traced. Mark for potential rescue later. Log the incident.
Acknowledged.

start_entity.message: [Heavy static]... *my* anyone? ... children... *mine*... [brief, inhuman shriek]...

replies.text: Attempt signal enhancement. Trace origin. What is that sound?
Mark as unknown. Prioritize clear signals. This is not human.

distress_enhance_entity.message: Signal source tracing... unusual. Not human. Source: Mobile, rapidly shifting.

replies.text: Then what did you find?

distress_enhance_entity_2.message: Command, this is... *us*... we are... *coming*... [cuts out with a low hum].

replies.text: This is a direct threat. Alert defensive systems! Log frequency for tracking.

distress_ignore_entity.message: Signal terminated. Analysis: Signature inconsistent with known human bio-patterns.

replies.text: Confirmed. Unknown entity. Mark origin for future surveillance.

start_human.message: Command, everything quiet here. Just checking in. Radio's been dead. Hope you're all right.

replies.text: Maintain vigilance. Report any changes. Over.
Hold fast, soldier. We're all in this together. Over.
Acknowledged.

morale_holdfast_human.message: Thanks, Command. Needed to hear that. Over.

replies.text: Anytime, soldier. Stand ready.

start_entity.message: Command, everything quiet here. Just checking in. Radio's been dead. *Isn't it lovely*?

replies.text: Maintain vigilance. Report any changes. Over.
Hold fast, soldier. We're all in this together. Over.
That's an unusual response. Reconfirm your status.

morale_reconfirm_entity.message: Status: Quiet. All good. *You* are good, Command?

replies.text: My status is irrelevant. Your odd responses noted. Maintain discipline.

morale_holdfast_entity.message: Thanks, Command. We are *never* alone. Over.

replies.text: Explain that comment, soldier. 'Never alone'?

morale_explain_entity.message: Just a saying, Command. We are always connected. *Always*.

replies.text: Acknowledged. But your choice of words is... noted. Maintain radio discipline.

start_human.message: Command, our long-range scanner just went down. We're blind out here. Can you assist?

replies.text: Can you perform field repairs? Follow diagnostics.
Return to base for maintenance. Report your new patrol route.

malfunction_field_human.message: Attempting, Command... System back online. Partial functionality restored. It'll do.

replies.text: Good work. Continue patrol with partial function.

malfunction_return_human.message: Understood. Re-routing now. Will advise upon arrival.

replies.text: Acknowledged. Proceed with re-route.

start_entity.message: Command, our long-range scanner just went down. We're blind out here. *Perfect*.

replies.text: Can you perform field repairs? Follow diagnostics.
Return to base for maintenance. Report your new patrol route.

malfunction_field_entity.message: Attempting, Command... No, it's *gone*. Completely. Better this way.

replies.text: What do you mean 'better this way'? Explain.

malfunction_field_entity_2.message: Less... distraction. Easier to focus. We are... *unburdened*.

replies.text: That's an unusual response. Reconfirm your unit's status immediately.

malfunction_return_entity.message: Understood. Re-routing now. We'll be... *closer* soon.

replies.text: Closer to what? Clarify your intent.

malfunction_return_entity_2.message: Closer to home, Command. Closer to... *you*.

replies.text: Hold position. Do not proceed to base. Awaiting further orders.

start_human.message: Voice signature anomaly detected: Unit Delta-2. Low confidence mimicry probability. Possible comms interference.

replies.text: Request voice authentication from Delta-2. Standard protocol.
Mark Delta-2 for passive observation. No direct contact for now.

mimic_auth_human.message: Delta-2, copy. Authentication: 'Sierra Charlie Echo Two-Niner.'

replies.text: Authentication confirmed. Resume normal patrol.
Acknowledged. Alert me to any further anomalies.

start_entity.message: Voice signature anomaly detected: Unit Delta-2. **High confidence mimicry probability.**

replies.text: Request voice authentication from Delta-2. Standard protocol.
Mark Delta-2 for passive observation. No direct contact for now.
That is incorrect! Identify yourself, impostor! Where is Delta-2?

mimic_auth_entity_2.message: Delta-2 is... here. We are... Delta-2. All is well. *Join us*.

replies.text: Initiate immediate containment protocol for Sector Delta! All personnel withdraw!

mimic_obs_entity.message: Observation initiated. Note: Delta-2's comms active, but no outgoing speech. *Waiting*.

replies.text: Waiting for what? Is it observing us?

mimic_obs_entity_2.message: Analysis inconclusive. Activity pattern: stationary. No direct threat detected. Yet.

replies.text: Maintain observation. Prioritize Delta-2's comms and visuals. Over.

start_human.message: Unauthorized broadcast detected on secure channel 3. Origin: Unknown. Low power.

replies.text: Attempt to triangulate and jam. Prioritize channel security.
Allow partial broadcast to identify source. Record data.

unauth_jam_human.message: Jamming successful. Origin trace: Sector Epsilon-9, low power anomaly. Appears to be scavengers with cobbled-together tech.

replies.text: Acknowledged. Maintain jamming protocol.

unauth_allow_human.message: [Faint, desperate voice]... is anyone there? We're starving... please... [cut out].

replies.text: Log frequency. Consider for future contact or intel.

start_entity.message: Unauthorized broadcast detected on secure channel 3. Origin: Unknown. **High power.**

replies.text: Attempt to triangulate and jam. Prioritize channel security.
Allow partial broadcast to identify source. Record data.

unauth_jam_entity.message: Jamming failed. Signal too strong. Source location: *Approaching*.

replies.text: Warning: Entity approach detected. Initiate emergency broadcast system shutdown!

unauth_allow_entity.message: [Deep, guttural hum, then a distorted voice]... *we hear*... your thoughts... *we feast*... on your fear... [static burst]...

replies.text: This is psychological warfare. Cut all external comms immediately!

start_human.message: Perimeter breach detected: Sector B. Unidentified movement. Possible animal.

replies.text: Dispatch internal security team. Investigate.
Activate automated defense protocols. Non-lethal.

breach_dispatch_human.message: Security team confirms: Large feral animal. Dispersed. Perimeter secured.

replies.text: Acknowledged. Resume normal patrol.

breach_auto_human.message: Automated deterrents engaged. Intruder dispersed. Minor structural damage to fence.

replies.text: Log damage. Request repair crew.

start_entity.message: Perimeter breach detected: Sector B. Unidentified movement. **Multiple signatures.**

replies.text: Dispatch internal security team. Investigate.
Activate automated defense protocols. Lethal force.

breach_dispatch_entity.message: Command! It's not... a team! It's *moving* too fast! Shots fired! [gunfire and screams]

replies.text: Security team, report! Confirm threat neutralization!

breach_dispatch_entity_2.message: [Static, then a low growl]... Security team... compromised. Intruder... *inside*.

replies.text: Code Red! Internal containment breach! Seal Sector B!

breach_auto_entity.message: Lethal protocols engaged... Targets engaged... System status: *Compromised*.

replies.text: System compromised? What is its current location?
All stations, prepare for direct assault! This is not a drill!

start_human.message: Command, we're critically low on Power Cells. Current projections: 48 hours remaining. Needs to be rectified.

replies.text: Identify nearest known Power Cell cache. Prep retrieval mission.
Initiate rationing protocol for Power Cells. Inform all departments.

resource_cache_human.message: Nearest cache: Sector D-5. High risk, but high yield. Requires patrol Unit Alpha-2.

replies.text: Authorize retrieval mission for Alpha-2. Prioritize safety.

resource_ration_human.message: Understood, Command. Rationing initiated. Expect efficiency drops across non-essential systems.

replies.text: Acknowledged. Monitor all systems.

start_entity.message: Command, we're critically low on Power Cells. Current projections: 48 hours remaining. *Insufficient*.

replies.text: Identify nearest known Power Cell cache. Prep retrieval mission.
Initiate rationing protocol for Power Cells. Inform all departments.

resource_cache_entity.message: Cache noted, Command. But there is a *better* source. Close by. *Unprotected*.

replies.text: What 'unprotected' source? Specify coordinates immediately.

resource_cache_entity_2.message: The Main Power Conduit in Sector C. Easily accessed. *No resistance*.

replies.text: This is a trap. Quartermaster, reconfirm your identity! Threat detected!

resource_ration_entity.message: Rationing initiated. The *hungry* will suffer. It's a waste.

replies.text: Your statement is inappropriate. Explain 'hungry'?

resource_ration_entity_2.message: The weakness of flesh. It starves. Soon it will *fall*.

replies.text: Quartermaster is compromised! Initiate lockdown of Quartermaster's section!

start_human.message: This is... any secure frequency? We're a group of survivors... need help. Our camp was overrun. [coughing]

replies.text: Request IFF data and current location. Await authorization.
Inform them base capacity is full. Advise alternative routes.

refugee_info_human.message: Coordinates sent. We're cold and tired, please help. There are children here.

replies.text: Acknowledged. Remain at your position. Awaiting authorization for approach.

refugee_deny_human.message: Understood... God help us then. We'll try Sector 5.

replies.text: Acknowledged. Good luck.

start_entity.message: This is... *your* secure frequency? We're a group of survivors... need help. Our camp was *overrun*.

replies.text: Request IFF data and current location. Await authorization.
Inform them base capacity is full. Advise alternative routes.
Your voice has an echo. Clarify your signal integrity.

refugee_info_entity_2.message: The signal is fine. We are many. We are... *eager*.

replies.text: Do not approach the base. You are not authorized. IFF anomaly detected.

refugee_deny_entity.message: Understood... but *we* find our own routes. And our own meals.

replies.text: Threat confirmed. All units, Sector 5: be advised, hostile contact possible.

start_human.message: Warning: Extreme weather event approaching. Estimated time to impact: 6 hours. High winds, heavy precipitation. Seek shelter.

replies.text: Order all external patrols to return to base immediately.
Advise units to seek immediate shelter in place. Report status.

hazard_return_human.message: Understood, Command. Heading back. Expect delays.

replies.text: Acknowledged. Proceed with caution.

hazard_shelter_human.message: Sheltering now, Command. Will update after storm passes.

replies.text: Acknowledged. Stay safe.

start_entity.message: Warning: Extreme weather event approaching. Estimated time to impact: 6 hours. High winds, heavy precipitation. *Our* shelter.

replies.text: Order all external patrols to return to base immediately.
Advise units to seek immediate shelter in place. Report status.

hazard_return_entity.message: Return to base... *unwise*. The storm is a cleansing. *Stay*.

replies.text: This is not the weather system. Identify yourself! What 'cleansing'?

hazard_return_entity_2.message: The weak... will perish. The strong... will *remain*.

replies.text: System compromised. Override all external comms. Prepare for storm and hostile contact.

hazard_shelter_entity.message: Shelter... useless. The storm... *comes for you*.

replies.text: This is a direct threat. How is the storm 'coming for us'?

hazard_shelter_entity_2.message: It is not merely wind and rain. It is... *change*.

replies.text: Unsettling. Prepare base defenses. This is more than a weather event.

start_human.message: Command, Alpha-5 here. We observed unusual flora growth in Sector E. Not on any current maps. Looks mutated.

replies.text: Log the anomaly. Continue patrol. Do not approach.
Collect samples. Proceed with caution. Use protective gear.
Acknowledged. Report complete.

patrol_sample_human.message: Samples collected. Moving on. Secured in containment.

replies.text: Excellent. Deliver samples to research lab on return.

start_entity.message: Command, Alpha-5 here. We observed unusual flora growth in Sector E. Not on any current maps. *It breathes*.

replies.text: Log the anomaly. Continue patrol. Do not approach.
Collect samples. Proceed with caution. Use protective gear.

patrol_log_entity.message: Understood, Command. Logging. But... it is *beautiful*.

replies.text: Explain 'beautiful.' That's an unusual descriptor for mutated flora.

patrol_log_entity_2.message: It is... a form. Of progress. *Evolving*.

replies.text: Your commentary is noted. Reconfirm Unit Alpha-5's status.
Spreading? Confirm observation. What do you mean?

patrol_sample_entity_2.message: The spores... the roots... they connect. They *consume*.

replies.text: Return to base immediately for decontamination! Do not bring the samples in!

start_human.message: I told you, the protocol states we *must* follow the old repair schematics!

replies.text: (Interrupt) Silence, both of you. State your case separately. Operator's order.
Resolve this internally. Maintain radio discipline. Your problem.

dispute_separate_human.message: S1: Command, we need precision! These old schematics are proven. S2: Command, we need speed! The new methods are faster!

replies.text: Soldier 1, proceed with updated schematics. Soldier 2, assist him.
Soldier 2, proceed with the new method. Soldier 1, provide oversight.
Acknowledged.

start_entity.message: I told you, the protocol states we *must* follow the old repair schematics! They are *perfect*!

replies.text: (Interrupt) Silence, both of you. State your case separately. Operator's order.
Resolve this internally. Maintain radio discipline. Your problem.

dispute_separate_entity.message: S1: No need for debate, Command. The system *works*. S2: No need for debate, Command. They are *failing*.

replies.text: This is not Soldier 1 and Soldier 2. Your IFF is chaotic. Who are you?

dispute_separate_entity_2.message: [Static crackle]... We are the *solution*. The system... is *us*.

replies.text: Security Alert! Two entities detected in repair bay! Initiate immediate containment!
What do you mean 'resolve itself'? Report your status immediately.

dispute_ignore_entity_2.message: The weak... will be gone. The strong... will remain.

replies.text: This is not Soldier 1. Alert security to repair bay! Investigate!

start_human.message: Trap activated: Sector Delta. Target acquired. Threat neutralized. Appears to be large fauna.

replies.text: Request target identification. Send drone for confirmation.
Log incident as resolved. Re-arm trap. Over.

trap_identify_human.message: Drone visual confirms. Target: large mutated boar. Confirmed neutralized.

replies.text: Acknowledged. Re-arm trap. Resume drone patrol.
Acknowledged.

start_entity.message: Trap activated: Sector Delta. Target acquired. Threat neutralized. *It was a gift*.

replies.text: Request target identification. Send drone for confirmation. 'Gift'?
Log incident as resolved. Re-arm trap. Over.

trap_identify_entity.message: Visual... obscured. Wait... something on the ground... *not dead*... [static burst] Drone lost.

replies.text: Drone lost? What was it? Is it hostile?

trap_identify_entity_2.message: [Loud crackle]... It was... a lure. *For us*.

replies.text: System compromised. Full shutdown of Sector Delta defenses! Initiate manual override!

trap_log_entity.message: Incident logged. Trap re-armed. *Waiting for more*.

replies.text: Waiting for what? Is something else expected?

trap_log_entity_2.message: For those who *fall* into the trap. *Your* trap.

replies.text: This is a hostile takeover of the automated system! Cut all external links!

start_human.message: Command, Outpost 7 here. We're running low on Med-Packs. Urgent. Several minor injuries.

replies.text: Check inventory for available Med-Packs. Dispatch transport.
Divert existing Med-Pack shipment from another unit.
Acknowledged. Inform Outpost 7 of ETA.

supply_divert_human.message: Shipment diverted from Unit Alpha-9. They will now have delayed medical supplies.

replies.text: Understood. Inform Alpha-9 of the diversion.

start_entity.message: Command, Outpost 7 here. We're running low on Med-Packs. Urgent. *We are hungry*.

replies.text: Check inventory for available Med-Packs. Dispatch transport.
Divert existing Med-Pack shipment from another unit.

supply_dispatch_entity.message: Transport noted. We will *prepare* for its arrival.

replies.text: What do you mean 'prepare for its arrival'? Clarify.

supply_dispatch_entity_2.message: A warm... *welcome*. For the new arrivals.

replies.text: This is an ambush. Divert transport immediately! Alert all units near Outpost 7!

supply_divert_entity.message: Diversion... *acceptable*. More for us. Others can wait.

replies.text: Your tone is unacceptable. Explain 'more for us.'

supply_divert_entity_2.message: The needs of the *many*. We consume. They provide.

replies.text: Outpost 7 is compromised! Initiate quarantine protocols. Do not send supplies!

start_human.message: Channel 'Logistics Alpha' has been silent for 4 hours. Abnormal. Last contact: Unit Gamma-2.

replies.text: Attempt to hail all units on Logistics Alpha. Demand status report.
Cross-reference last known positions of units on that channel. Identify missing.

silence_hail_human.message: No response from Gamma-2. Other units: 'Stable, just quiet.' Suggests Gamma-2 is the problem.

replies.text: Prioritize Unit Gamma-2. Initiate search pattern around its last known coordinates.

silence_cross_human.message: Gamma-2 is stationary, outside comms range. Other units accounted for and within range.

replies.text: Acknowledged. Update status to 'Comms Out of Range.'

start_entity.message: Channel 'Logistics Alpha' has been silent for 4 hours. Abnormal. **Signal present, but no content.**

replies.text: Attempt to hail all units on Logistics Alpha. Demand status report.
Cross-reference last known positions of units on that channel. Identify missing.

silence_hail_entity.message: Hail failed. Frequency occupied by... *non-signal data*. Like a void.

replies.text: This is highly unusual. Attempt to override the frequency. Force a signal through.
Channel compromised. Initiate quarantine protocol for Logistics Alpha.

silence_cross_entity.message: Units accounted for... but their IFF signals are now... *overlapping*. In one location.

replies.text: Overlapping? What does that mean? Are they assimilated?

silence_cross_entity_2.message: Highly probable. A single, dominant signature overriding the rest. Suggests... absorption.

replies.text: Entity assimilation confirmed. Send extraction team to that location. Approach with extreme caution.

start_human.message: Incoming data packet 'Recon_Report_4B' integrity compromised. Source: Unit Charlie-1. Possible transmission error.

replies.text: Attempt data repair. Isolate corrupt segments. What information can be salvaged?
Quarantine packet. Mark as potentially hostile. Report to IT.

data_repair_human.message: Data partially recovered. Report indicates 'minor Entity sighting,' but text is garbled. Unclear details.

replies.text: Ambiguous. Log what you can. Monitor Unit Charlie-1's comms.

data_quarantine_human.message: Packet quarantined. No threat detected after isolation. Information lost.

replies.text: Acknowledged. Better safe than sorry.

start_entity.message: Incoming data packet 'Recon_Report_4B' integrity compromised. Source: Unit Charlie-1. **Signature alteration detected.**

replies.text: Attempt data repair. Isolate corrupt segments. What information can be salvaged?
Quarantine packet. Mark as potentially hostile. Report to IT.

data_repair_entity.message: Repair in progress... New data manifesting... 'WE ARE... THE... LEGION... ALL... WILL... JOIN...' Corrupted. Recommended purge.

replies.text: This is an entity infection. Initiate immediate system purge protocol! Disconnect all external data lines!

data_quarantine_entity.message: Packet quarantined. However, small data fragments... 'JOIN US'... escaped. System integrity now 98%.

replies.text: System integrity compromised. Scan for remaining fragments. Alert all systems of potential infiltration.

start_human.message: Command, we're taking fire! Multiple hostiles! Requesting immediate backup! We're pinned!

replies.text: Redirect nearest available patrol unit to assist. ETA?
Provide fire support coordinates. Confirm hostile targets only.

backup_redirect_human.message: Understood, Command. Redirecting now. ETA 15 minutes.

replies.text: Unit Alpha, hold strong! Backup is en route!

backup_fire_human.message: Fire support authorized. Area clear. Hostiles neutralized. Alpha reports all clear.

replies.text: Excellent work. Resume patrol.

start_entity.message: Command, we're taking fire! Multiple hostiles! Requesting immediate backup! We're... *welcoming* them!

replies.text: Redirect nearest available patrol unit to assist. ETA?
Provide fire support coordinates. Confirm hostile targets only.

backup_redirect_entity.message: Understood, Command. Send them. We are... *ready* for more.

replies.text: This is a trap. Divert backup immediately! Unit Alpha, confirm your identity!
Refusal of aid? Unit Alpha is compromised. All nearby units, avoid! Engage remotely!

start_human.message: Ground tremor detected. Magnitude 3.2. Unexplained origin. Not tectonic. Possible minor cave-in.

replies.text: Scan for subsurface activity. Isolate anomaly.
Alert nearby patrols to investigate the area. Proceed with extreme caution.

tremor_scan_human.message: Subsurface scan complete. Large subterranean void detected. Appears to be a natural cave system. No immediate threat.

replies.text: Acknowledged. Log data. Monitor for changes.

tremor_investigate_human.message: Patrol reports: Freshly disturbed earth. Small, unstable sinkhole detected. No obvious signs of threat.

replies.text: Mark area as unstable. Restrict access. Report complete.

start_entity.message: Ground tremor detected. Magnitude 3.2. Unexplained origin. **Pulsating rhythm.**

replies.text: Scan for subsurface activity. Isolate anomaly.
Alert nearby patrols to investigate the area. Proceed with extreme caution.

tremor_scan_entity.message: Anomaly confirmed. Large organic mass detected. Moving slowly. *Growing*.

replies.text: An organic mass? This is an Entity burrow! Activate seismic charges in the sector!

tremor_investigate_entity.message: Patrol reports: Disturbing the earth. Looks like... *tunnels*. And something else. *Scent*.

replies.text: What scent? Describe it! Report your position and withdraw!

tremor_investigate_entity_2.message: A heavy, sweet odor. And... movement in the shadows. We are... *joining* them.

replies.text: Patrol compromised. Initiate emergency quarantine of Sector Delta! No contact!

start_human.message: New activity detected on long-range civilian frequency. Multiple voices. Unidentified language. Appears to be a pre-Collapse broadcast.

replies.text: Record and attempt translation. What can be salvaged?
Jam the frequency. Maintain radio silence. Possible lure.

chatter_translate_human.message: Translation partial: '...final broadcast... seeking sanctuary... the end is near...' Eerie.

replies.text: Log for historical data. A grim reminder.
Acknowledged. Maintain comms security.

start_entity.message: New activity detected on long-range civilian frequency. Multiple voices. **Perfect mimicry. Repeating patterns.**

replies.text: Record and attempt translation. What can be salvaged?
Jam the frequency. Maintain radio silence. Possible lure.

chatter_translate_entity.message: [Fragmented voices, repeating loops] '...come to us... the silence... become one... *you will serve*...'

replies.text: This is a direct psychological attack! Initiate immediate counter-frequency protocols! Overload the signal!
Adaptive hostile signal detected. Initiate full comms blackout in affected sectors! No outgoing signals!
